history.text: What about this movie do you like?
Hi I just watched the movie Reel Steel. I like that is a science fiction movie.
What do you like about it?
I also enjoy Hugh Jackman as an actor
I like that it is more than just a father and son relationship but about pride, love, value and worth.
Hugh Jackman is an incredible actor.
I have never read the book it is based on. I think that would be interesting to compare the two.
What scene from the movie was your favorite?
Yes, the books are always different from the movies.
I liked the robot fighting scenes
I'm surprised it got such low marks
Yes those were interesting, i like the training scenes because the relations between max and atom as well as his father.
I especially liked the bull scene
But it did make me feel bad for Charlie
Rotten tomatoes which is probably the best one to view score gave it a 59 but cinemaScore gave it an A. It is a good film to watch. I felt bad for charlie for a moment but more for his son.
what else about this move stood out as a pivotal moment?
When he found a robot with his son.
That was a really important part of the movie
the moment when charlie and his son make up got me because he knows he not the best father but he can be a friend.
It also brings him closer to his son which is really important
that is a really good part of the movie too
very true
I also liked how even though Charlie needed money they did not sell Atom because Max didn't want him to
Yes and the message through the movie was to never give up which may be cliché but through their hardest outcomes  they had victory in the end.

one of the scenes they talk about was about the twin cities fight . In the midst of the scene you can see charlie and his son become closer but disappointed because charlie cant live up to the potential of being a fater.

That is a great message. I also think Max is a very understanding kid to put up with all his father's setbacks even after all they went through and he gave him back to Debra, Max was always ready to go back to his Dad.
Yes that was funny because he knew they needed to stay together and fight,
Atom also becomes a character of his own I feel like. He also has to overcome hardships while battling. Every time he gets hit, he gets back up just like Charlie and Max.

True and also you just can rely on technology just to get your through but a some compassion from people can go very far and that was the relationship between atom and max. In the end there were champions even though they didnt win
the fighting scene between Atom and Zeus is a great example of this. Everyone thought Zeus would win and Atom's voice-respond control system even stopped working but they got through it.
I think even though Zeus one, the majority of people had more compassion for Atom
Yes never underestimate the underdog
won*
Alright, it was good talking with you about the movie!
u too
